dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.threat.SecurityThreat
dataStructure.description:
Represents entities and characteristics of entities that may maliciously or non-maliciously exploit vulnerabilities on IT components.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityThreat

child.name: type
child.description:
The type of threat, such as: Organization Person Tool - A tool will contain some number of exploits in addition to means to propagate and exercise the exploits against a target.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type

child.name: securityThreatTechnique
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityThreatEmploys

This association end is optional
child.label: securityThreatTechnique

child.name: securityThreatActor
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityThreatPosedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: securityThreatActor

child.name: entityIdentification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityThreatReferences

This association end is optional
child.label: entityIdentification

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityThreatRepresentedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: securityThreatIndicator

child.name: securityThreatExploit

This element is generated from an association end.
